page.title: 09House Life In Bury
page.content: {Yelcon Homes Owner: They bought the house because it was big,well built and they thought the appearance of each house own different character.They liked the area because it was handily placed inbetween Peterbourgh and Huntingdon.They moved because of,a change of job.When they buy another house they will buy a new house.They think a new house is better than an older one because you don't have to do any repairs. {Galliford's Homes Owner: The owner was very pleased with the price of the house.The owner was pleased with the large rooms and the gas heating.The owner prefers new houses,but she doesn't like living in Bury because facilities.They do not like the plan of the estate because it is not private enough.
